metadata.name: aB: Remastered
metadata.description:
The Binding of Isaac Alphabirth: Mom's Closet is the first of many packs to be developed by TeamAlpha!
Download the complete Alphabirth collection here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=866199068
This one in particular adds:
> 31 new items! (including 3 unlockables) > 2 new trinkets! > 1 enemy variant! > 1 new transformation! > 1 new pickup (unlockable) > 1 new character! > and 4 new challenges, all making use of our items!
This mod requires AlphaAPI to function: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=908404046
Visit our wiki for information: https://alphabirth.gamepedia.com/Alphabirth_Wiki
Feel free to contact us at our DISCORD SERVER for Questions, Bug Reports, and Communication: https://discord.gg/Yypj3Ee
We are working to ensure quality and intend to respond as quickly as we can!
For those of you who may have less time on your hands, I hear there's a certain starting_room_enabled variable in the code that may assist you!
Special thanks to AwesomeX357 for contributing a few ideas!
